subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Long before he led Minnesota to an N.C.A.A. title as a freshman and was the Buffalo Sabres’ first-round pick of the 2003 N.H.L. draft, Thomas Vanek felt the burden of expectations.
snippet: Long before he led Minnesota to an N.C.A.A. title as a freshman and was the Buffalo Sabres’ first-round pick of the 2003 N.H.L. draft, Thomas Vanek felt the burden of expectations.
